zones.suggested_route: Head to the North to kill the boss. The Mysterious Campsite spawns to the left or right of the starting zone.
zones.notes: Beira is always north/northeast of waypoint. Mud Burrow and the worm boss can be skipped.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Beira of the Rotten Pack
points_of_interest.location_hint: Always north/northeast of waypoint

points_of_interest.name: Mysterious Campsite (Abandoned Stash)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Spawns to the left or right of the starting zone

points_of_interest.name: Mud Burrow Entrance / Waypoint
points_of_interest.location_hint: Can be skipped - worm boss is not required

walkthrough_steps.action: Kill Beira of the Rotten Pack
walkthrough_steps.tip: Boss is always north/northeast of waypoint

walkthrough_steps.action: Find exit to Grelwood
walkthrough_steps.tip: Use checkpoint from Beira to return if you find exit first

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Mysterious Campsite
walkthrough_steps.tip: Uncut support gem reward - spawns left or right of starting zone

zones.suggested_route: This zone is often skipped by speedrunners. Boss is typically found within the area.
zones.notes: Entire zone is optional and can be skipped. Only recommended for first characters.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Devourer
points_of_interest.reward: Uncut Skill Gem (Level 2) (Boss Drop), Uncut Support Gem (Level 1) (Quest Reward)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Boss is typically found within the area

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill The Devourer
walkthrough_steps.tip: Entire zone is optional - speedrunners skip this

zones.suggested_route: Follow the diamond pattern to find the four main points of interest. The Red Vale entrance is usually in the same quadrant as the Brambleghast arena.
zones.notes: Find waypoint first (somewhat in center). Enter zones to take their waypoints, then backtrack to Grelwood.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Brambleghast
points_of_interest.location_hint: Usually in same quadrant as Red Vale entrance

points_of_interest.name: Aregane's Hut (Witch Hut)
points_of_interest.reward: Medium Life and Medium Mana Flask, Uncut Support Gem (Level 1)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Look for the Cauldron encounter - free medium life/mana flask

points_of_interest.name: Tree of Souls + Waypoint
points_of_interest.location_hint: Somewhat in center of zone

points_of_interest.name: Grim Tangle Entrance
points_of_interest.location_hint: Enter zone, take waypoint, then backtrack to Grelwood

points_of_interest.name: The Red Vale Entrance
points_of_interest.location_hint: Enter zone, take waypoint, then backtrack to Grelwood

walkthrough_steps.action: Find waypoint and talk to quest NPC
walkthrough_steps.tip: Waypoint is somewhat in center of zone

walkthrough_steps.action: Find exit to Grim Tangle
walkthrough_steps.tip: Enter zone, take waypoint, backtrack to Grelwood

walkthrough_steps.action: Find exit to Red Vale
walkthrough_steps.tip: Enter zone, take waypoint, backtrack to Grelwood

walkthrough_steps.action: Go to Red Vale
walkthrough_steps.tip: Either via waypoint or checkpoint

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Brambleghast
walkthrough_steps.tip: Level 2 uncut skill gem reward

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Cauldron in the Witch Hut encounter
walkthrough_steps.tip: Free medium mana/life flask

town_visits.instructions: Go back to town, get runic tools from Renly
Go to Grelwood waypoint, click the three runes, talk to Una
Go back to town, talk to Una

zones.suggested_route: Follow a general loop pattern to locate the three Rust Altars for the quest.
zones.notes: Find the three obelisks and get the three quest items (Rust Altars).

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Rust King
points_of_interest.location_hint: Found after completing the Rust Altars quest

points_of_interest.name: Weapon Piles (Multiple)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Located throughout the zone

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the three obelisks and get the three quest items
walkthrough_steps.tip: Follow a loop pattern to locate all three Rust Altars

walkthrough_steps.action: Return to Grelwood for town visit sequence
walkthrough_steps.tip: See town visits for detailed steps

zones.suggested_route: Head in the opposite direction of the entrance; this is where the area 'opens up' and usually leads to the exit.
zones.notes: The Rotten Druid boss is optional. Head to Cemetery of the Eternals after entering.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Rotten Druid (Optional)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Found in the area where it 'opens up' opposite the entrance

walkthrough_steps.action: Find exit to Cemetery of the Eternals
walkthrough_steps.tip: Head opposite direction of entrance where area opens up

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill The Rotten Druid
walkthrough_steps.tip: Uncut support gem reward

zones.suggested_route: Hug one wall; one tomb (Mausoleum or Tomb of the Consort) often spawns alongside the same wall as the Boss arena (57%+ of the time).
zones.notes: Clear both tombs before fighting Lachlann. Use checkpoint to teleport to zone beginning, then waypoint back to Cemetery.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Lachlann of Endless Lament
points_of_interest.location_hint: Hug one wall - boss arena often on same wall as one tomb entrance

points_of_interest.name: Ancient Ruin Sarcophagus (beside Grieving Epitaph)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Found beside Grieving Epitaph

points_of_interest.name: Mausoleum of the Praetor Entrance
points_of_interest.location_hint: One tomb entrance - complete Sorrow Among Stones quest

points_of_interest.name: Tomb of the Consort Entrance
points_of_interest.location_hint: Second tomb entrance - complete Sorrow Among Stones quest

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Mausoleum, kill the boss inside
walkthrough_steps.tip: On second boss, use checkpoint to teleport to zone beginning, then waypoint to Cemetery

walkthrough_steps.action: Find the Tomb, kill the boss inside
walkthrough_steps.tip: Part of Sorrow Among Stones quest

walkthrough_steps.action: Talk to Lachlann, open the gate, kill Lachlann
walkthrough_steps.tip: Main boss after completing both tombs

walkthrough_steps.action: Enter Hunting Grounds
walkthrough_steps.tip: Continue to next zone

quests.name: Sorrow Among Stones
quests.description: Requires killing bosses in Mausoleum of the Praetor and Tomb of the Consort.

zones.suggested_route: The Boss arena tends to spawn in the opposite quadrant of your entrance tile. Search for the distinctive ribbed outer edge of the boss tile.
zones.notes: Part of Sorrow Among Stones quest. Kill Draven to progress.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Draven
points_of_interest.reward: Part of Sorrow Among Stones quest
points_of_interest.location_hint: Boss arena spawns in opposite quadrant from entrance - look for ribbed outer edge

points_of_interest.name: Forgotten Riches (Treasure Trove)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Optional treasure encounter

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Boss: Draven
walkthrough_steps.tip: Required for Sorrow Among Stones quest

zones.suggested_route: The boss area is typically found along the top of the area.
zones.notes: Part of Sorrow Among Stones quest. Optional: Find Embattled Trove for uncut support gem.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Asinia
points_of_interest.reward: Part of Sorrow Among Stones quest
points_of_interest.location_hint: Boss area typically found along the top of the area

points_of_interest.name: Haunted Treasure (Embattled Trove)
points_of_interest.location_hint: Ambush encounter within the tomb

walkthrough_steps.action: Find and kill Boss: Asinia
walkthrough_steps.tip: Required for Sorrow Among Stones quest

walkthrough_steps.action: In the Tomb, find the Embattled Trove ambush encounter
walkthrough_steps.tip: Uncut support gem reward

zones.suggested_route: Follow the edges and avoid the middle. Points of Interest are located in or close to the corners.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Crowbell
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points)

zones.suggested_route: Make a loop to find all three Ritual encounters. If you find the boss arena early, watch for 'black magic swirls' which point to any incomplete Rituals.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The King in the Mists (after 4 rituals)
points_of_interest.reward: Permanent Buff: +30 to Maximum Spirit, Uncut Spirit Gem (Level 4)

zones.suggested_route: Exit is always on the opposite wall of the entrance. Find Una's Hut behind a hut/cart combo.

points_of_interest.name: Una's Lute (inside Una's Lute Box)
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points)

zones.suggested_route: Hug the right-hand wall from the entrance and head up (North) toward the boss arena.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Executioner
points_of_interest.reward: Uncut Support Gem (Level 1), Uncut Skill Gem (Level 5) (Quest Reward: Save Leitis)

points_of_interest.name: Renly's Workshop (Smithing Tools)
points_of_interest.reward: Unlocks Salvage Bench, Artificer's Orb, Blank Lesser Rune

zones.suggested_route: Follow the U-shaped pattern.
Head Northeast, cross the bridge, proceed North to the boss, then Southeast for the Level 2 entrance.
Head in the opposite direction of the entrance, cross the bridge, and continue toward the third floor entrance (Northeast if starting from Southwest).
Head in the opposite direction from the entrance to find the bridge leading to the boss elevator.
Follow the inside wall corresponding to the direction the town area 'leans' (Z-shape pattern) until you find a narrow canyon leading to the boss.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Rathbreaker
points_of_interest.reward: Uncut Skill Gem (Level 6) (Quest Reward), Progresses Earning Passage quest

zones.suggested_route: Follow an S-shape or Z-shape pattern, hugging a wall and following the bridges to the Mawdun Mine entrance.
The layout is static (diamond shape); spawn at the bottom, move continuously North to find the boss at the top corner.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Rudja, the Dread Engineer
points_of_interest.reward: Uncut Skill Gem, main storyline progression

zones.suggested_route: Find the Decree of Imprisonment. Follow the yellow paper seals on the walls to locate Balbala. The opposite direction leads to The Halani Gates.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Balbala, the Traitor
points_of_interest.reward: Djinn Barya (access to Trial of the Sekhema for Ascendancy)

zones.suggested_route: Follow the extremely set, narrow layout, moving in the opposite direction from the entrance and crossing the bridges.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Jamanra, the Risen King
points_of_interest.reward: Advances The Trail of Corruption quest

zones.suggested_route: Run the outside edges to find The Venom Pit (for Kabala) and the exit to The Lost City (often in the opposite corner of the central 'square').

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Kabala, Constrictor Queen
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points)

zones.suggested_route: Cross the V-shaped bridge connecting the two large rectangular sections. Continue in the opposite direction from the entrance to locate the exit to Buried Shrines (often in a corner of the second rectangle).

points_of_interest.name: The Ninth Treasure of Keth (Optional Boss)

zones.suggested_route: Think of it as two rectangles separated by a pair of bridges. The boss tile (crown shape) is usually at the most Northerly or East-facing point.
Hug a wall until you find the exit to The Bone Pits.
The boss room is almost directly in line with the entrance area after passing through the bone arch.

points_of_interest.name: Bosses: Iktab, the Deathlord and Ekbab, Ancient Steed
points_of_interest.reward: Uncut Support Gem (Level 1) (Quest Reward for 'A Theft of Ivory')

zones.suggested_route: Run the outside edge to find the three Ancient Seals required to open the sealed Titan Grotto Entrance (Red Hand icon).

points_of_interest.name: Offering to Amrit Quest (Medallion)
points_of_interest.reward: Permanent Buff: +30% increased Charm Charges Gained or 15% increased Mana Recovery from Flasks

zones.suggested_route: Travel from the starting area to the opposite side of the 'rectangle' to find the long staircase bridge leading to the boss, Zalmarath.

Check the base of the large buildings for the body of the fallen Dekhara Warrior (Final Letter). Continue travelling opposite the entrance to the furthest edge of the second area for the Path of Mourning exit.

points_of_interest.name: Tradition's Toll Quest (Final Letter)
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points)

zones.suggested_route: Travel to the opposite side of the area (potential '3-3-3 Pattern').
Tor Gul spawns in a straight line, directly opposite the entrance of the area.
Straightforward, linear layout. Continue in the opposite direction of the entrance until the final boss arena.

points_of_interest.name: Final Boss: Jamanra, the Abomination
points_of_interest.reward: Completes The Trail of Corruption, End of Act 2

zones.suggested_route: Exit (Ziggurat Encampment) is found on the opposite far wall from the entrance. Run along that wall until found. Azak Campfire is nearby, check both sides.
Follow one of the outside walls towards the opposite end (Infested Barrens entrance). Mighty Silverfist usually spawns in the top third of the area.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Mighty Silverfist
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points)

zones.suggested_route: Find the Corpse-snake Venom in The Den of the Serpent Priestess.

points_of_interest.name: Corpse Snake Venom Quest Reward
points_of_interest.reward: Permanent Buff (Choice of +25% Stun Threshold, +30% Elemental Ailment Threshold, or +25% Mana Regeneration Rate); Artificer's Orb

zones.suggested_route: Run the outside edge of the area to locate exits to Chimeral Wetlands, Azak Bog, and Matlan Waterways.

points_of_interest.name: Troubled Camp
points_of_interest.reward: Sebastian Carroway (Secret Vendor: Weapons), guaranteed Rare Boots

zones.suggested_route: The boss, Ignagduk, spawns in the top right quadrant of this area (imagined as a square split into four blocks).

points_of_interest.name: Flameskin Ritual (Optional)
points_of_interest.reward: Temporary buff to Fire Resistance and Item Rarity

zones.suggested_route: Hug the outside wall. Xyclucean's arena/Machinarium entrance always faces left/West; Temple of Chaos is always North-facing.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Xyclucian, The Chimera
points_of_interest.reward: Chimeral Inscribed Ultimatum (access to Trial of Chaos), Uncut Skill Gem (Level 9)

zones.suggested_route: Find Small Soul Cores (listen for the jingle) to proceed. The exit to Sanctum is usually in a straight line from the start of the second section. Blackjaw spawns on the far left or right.
Locate a Generator toward the back end of each of the two mirrored sections. Use Medium Soul Cores to power both.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Zicoatl, Warden of the Core

zones.suggested_route: Linear area; must pull correct levers to lower water and proceed.
Two large blocks connected by an ambush area. Apex of Filth entrance (right/left) or Molten Vault (corner/side). Layout is the same as Utzaal (Past).
Linear; kills boss quickly (under 4 minutes) before molten gold floods the area.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Mektul, the Forgemaster
points_of_interest.reward: Uncut Skill Gem (Level 10), Unlocks Reforging Bench, Artificer's Orb (Quest Reward)

quests.name: The Treasures of Utzaal
quests.description: Requires defeating Mektul and claiming The Hammer of Kamasa.

zones.suggested_route: Spiral pattern curling inwards. Boss is found at the top wall of the large main area.

points_of_interest.name: The Gentle Crone (Secret Vendor)
points_of_interest.reward: Sells higher quality Jewellery and Spellcaster gear

zones.suggested_route: Triangular layout; find the entrance to the next floor in one of the three corners.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Ketzuli, High Priest of the Sun

zones.suggested_route: Same layout as The Drowned City. Boss (Viper Napuatzi) is typically towards the right end of the zone, facing North.

points_of_interest.name: Perculiar Fortunes (Golden Idols)
points_of_interest.reward: Various Idols that can be sold to Oswald for Gold (500-1500 Gold each)

zones.suggested_route: Find the large 'worship platform'. The exit to Black Chambers is usually top left; Sacrificial table is usually top right.

points_of_interest.name: Sacrificial Altar (Blood Sacrifice Quest)
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points)

zones.suggested_route: Three major sections separated by bridges. Doryani's arena is on the opposite side from the entrance, along the center line.
Talk to Doryani, Alva, Rog, and Makoru (Captain of Aurora May) to unlock the island map.

points_of_interest.name: Makoru (Captain)
points_of_interest.reward: Grants access to Karui Archipelago map

zones.suggested_route: Use this area to catch up on XP; find the entrance to Singing Caverns, usually at the far end of the island.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Great White One (Shark Pit)

zones.suggested_route: The boss is located on the opposite side of the 'square' from the entrance (circular or diamond shape layout).

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Diamora, Song of Death
points_of_interest.reward: Weapon Piece, Shoreline Hideout (unlocks hideout after speaking to Ange)

points_of_interest.name: Beckoning Clam (Humming Pearl)
points_of_interest.reward: Rare Pearlescent Amulet (Quest turn-in to Rog)

zones.suggested_route: Follow the long and winding road; the boss is located at the end.
Locate the entrance to Solitary Confinement.

points_of_interest.name: Goddess of Justice (Requires Chapel Key)
points_of_interest.reward: Permanent Buff (Choice: 30% increased Life or Mana Recovery from Flasks)

zones.suggested_route: Hug the wall that the waves are crashing into.

points_of_interest.name: Bronnach, the Manhunter (Optional)
points_of_interest.reward: Guaranteed unique item and some rares

zones.suggested_route: Head in the opposite direction from the dock. Locate the entrance to Volcanic Warrens on the far end of the area along the furthest wall from the start.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: The Blind Beast (Primal Arena)
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points)

points_of_interest.name: Beast Pen (Mimbok the Enslaved)
points_of_interest.reward: Uncut Skill Gem (Level 12) + Uncut Support Gem (Level 4)

zones.suggested_route: Long and winding area; boss spawn is on the opposite side of where you enter.
Follow the path to the other side.
Get to the opposite side, furthest from where you entered.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Omniphobia (Dark Mists Quest)
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points) (NEW IN 0.4)

zones.suggested_route: Exit town, hug the top wall (Coastal Ridge) to find the bells, then return to the central path to find the arena for Torvian.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Torvian, Hand of the Savior

zones.suggested_route: Two large blocks connected by a small central square. Hug a wall until you find the boss/Precursor Forge area.

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Benedictus, First Herald of Utopia

zones.suggested_route: Snake-like funnel. Complete three challenge rooms. One path leads to Silent Hall, the other to Halls of the Dead.
Find the three Hinekora Totems (Tawhoa, Tasalio, Ngamahu) on the corners of an imaginary rectangle to gain permanent buffs before fighting Yama the White.

points_of_interest.name: Hinekora Totems (3 rewards)
points_of_interest.reward: Choice of +5% Res or +5 Attribute (+5% Fire Res or +5 Str, +5% Cold Res or +5 Dex, +5% Lightning Res or +5 Int)

points_of_interest.name: Boss: Yama the White
points_of_interest.reward: Access to Trial of the Ancestors

zones.suggested_route: Complete the Trial and speak to Hinekora (Navali).

points_of_interest.name: Hinekora (Navali)
points_of_interest.reward: Book of Specialisation (+2 Weapon Set Skill Points)

zones.suggested_route: Find the boundary edge after leaving the large building and follow it to Heart of the Tribe.
Continually head Northerly; the final boss is in the direction opposite the nearest Checkpoint.

points_of_interest.name: Final Boss: Tavakai the Fallen / Tavakai the Consumed
